website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok CrossFit Nano Pump Fusion was welcomed by a large number of cross-training aficionados. The style, the traction, and the fit were touted as agreeable assets of the trainer. However, the Pump technology was unhelpful in achieving the right fit for some users. Other gripes included the tight opening and inconsistent sizing scheme. Overall, CrossFit aficionadoes were pretty satisfied with this trainer.
pros: The Reebok CrossFit Nano Pump Fusion held up well for various CrossFit WODs, cardio training, short runs, and gym sessions, as stated by most testers
A lot of wearers lauded the shoe for its comfortable footbed
A light, yet sturdy material of the upper unit gained the favor of many users
The Pump technology was welcomed by some athletes
apparently, it allowed them to customize the fit precisely to their preference
A handful of reviewers took note of the excellent grip of the outsole
Some buyers found the style of the shoe to be clean and modern
cons: A considerable number of wearers complained that the tight cleatie construction of the upper required a lot of effort to put on the shoe
Many purchasers experienced inconsistencies in the sizing scheme
the shoe ran either longer or shorter than they expected
Some users found the Pump technology to be a gimmick
apparently, they didn’t even need to use it to get the right fit
A few athletes reported that the Pump deflated during the workout
moreover, it flattened to a different extent in each shoe, making the fit uncomfortably uneven
Several buyers thought that the product was overpriced

customer_reviews.title: Too big, too hot...just no.
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of these shoes. I ordered them a half size smaller as per other reviewers, but they are still too big. I ran outa my shoes during sled pushes. I have "pumped" them up multiple times and not much changes. I even went to the reebok website and watched a video on how the "pump" works. I was doing it correctly. Not only are they huge....they are HOT. Not only do I sweat profusely, but now my feet do too. That makes for an awful wet shoe that takes days to dry. Since I work out everyday, this is a constant problem. On a positive....they look really cool. Probably won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect indoor rowing shoes!  Great!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, and I was able to order my usual size. I have very narrow feet, and the shoes are not too wide at all. Just enough room for my toes to be comfortable, and the pump makes the heels fit, too. I was surprised that they are slip on shoes, initially were hard to put on, but became easier after wearing them a couple of times. I'm using these for indoor rowing and weight training, and couldn't be happier. Ordered a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Gen Z

customer_reviews.title: Extremely wide
customer_reviews.text: These are so wide to the point that they look *ridiculous*. Without the tongue, you can't even cinch them down so they fit. Unless you have extremely wide and tall feet, you are going to have to return these. They looked so big I had to double check that they were women's.
customer_reviews.author: Nina P

customer_reviews.title: Like the stability and comfort of this shoe a lot
customer_reviews.text: Like the stability and comfort of this shoe a lot. The support on the side of the shoe where I tend to cramp up when lifting is fantastic. No more foot cramps.There is no tongue in this shoe, it's all one piece so it took a little getting used to but not bad. I have a wide foot and these are a good secure fit just a little awkward to get on. I like the pump action. Overall a really good shoe!
customer_reviews.author: LauraB

customer_reviews.title: ... the rest of the shoe is roomy and would like to pump them up but it just digs in ...
customer_reviews.text: they are hard to get on and the top digs into the top of my foot where the rest of the shoe is roomy and would like to pump them up but it just digs in more. I am already in pain doing my workout I dont need my shoe to make it worse! I wear them for my wod and take them right off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them, the only Crossfit show that I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them, the only Crossfit show that I can wear for anything other than Crossfit due to more support! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Buy these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes! They're super comfortable I can wear them all day. The have a good grip sole and a nice and snug fit. Great for working out or for being on your feet for nearly 12 hrs straight. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Just V

customer_reviews.title: Perfact
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I would say I have wide feet , these shoes fit perfectly w the with an run true to size. I'm a 9.5 -10 ordered a 9.5 fits perfect! For the $ amazing shoes.. wish I ordered 2 pair
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: great purchase. i was worried first that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: great purchase. i was worried first that it is not a normal shoes in terms of it has no "tongue". it is not that easy to put on, but i like the way it keeps my feet tight + how it pumps. it is really good to lift weight in these shoes. this price was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: BRB

customer_reviews.title: They look really nice and I can't say how they fit since I ...
customer_reviews.text: They look really nice and I can't say how they fit since I can't even get them on my feet. They might be good for narrow feet, I have wide feet and could not even put them on, even my 8 year old son was having a hard time putting his feet in them . Very disappointed since they look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Pump you up??
customer_reviews.text: Okey so I bought into the pump hype after seeing the commercial. I've gone back to my old nano because my knees were hurting and my feet felt too squishy! I'm using for walking shoes instead 😁
customer_reviews.author: LzardGutz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. First time a broke a pair of sneakers. Used it for walking only. Not comfortable to wear all day. Need assistance to put the on until you break it. Only pro: I love the style and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin D.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome. I was worried they would be too loose ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. I was worried they would be too loose because they don't tie traditionally. Excellent shoe. Would recommend. About as wide as the nano 4s.
customer_reviews.author: WHK3030

customer_reviews.title: Too big.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very comfy, and perfect for Crossfit & other training activities, but runs on the large fit. I would suggest to buy it half size smaller of your size.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Nunez Colon

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable Crossfit shoe
customer_reviews.text: Durable and comfortable Crossfit shoe. Plenty of room in the toe box, which is important to me. Wouldn't be great for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: elyonwoo

customer_reviews.title: They don't have a tongue
customer_reviews.text: No tongue made them almost impossible to get on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I always like the reebok brand running. For some reasom5it works with my wide flat foot.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marvel

customer_reviews.title: The shoe itself is good, although this model is a little tough to ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is good, although this model is a little tough to get on your foot. Reeboks in general run small, so order a half to full size larger than your regular shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel "She-Ra" Stone

customer_reviews.title: I did not like these shoes at all
customer_reviews.text: I did not like these shoes at all. First of all I could not get them on. They are one solid piece and made of rubber like a water shoe. Not at all what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: karen boig

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is a very nice shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a larger size to get more room in the toe box area. Otherwise it is a very nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Vonnied

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Like how light this shows is. Also, it has a very clean and modern look to it. People do notice it ans ask me about it all the time. PS i had to get one size bigger. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Other than that great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Normally I don't have an issue with the size of the Nano's but this one is just a little too tight. Other than that great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Valero

customer_reviews.title: Not good for thin feet
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are good for people with wide feet, if you have thin feet this is not a good option since pump only works in ankle area, thus your ankle feels snug but rest of foot is swimming inside the shoe. Shoe has no tongue and you cannot adjust tightness of shoe lace, since the hooks of shoe laces are made up of elastic material which makes laces pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia  I.

customer_reviews.title: Try Them Maynard
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits well. And like previous reviews, there is a bit of a challenge in getting the shoe on but not enough to keep you from wearing it. I am returning mine because I ordered my usual size and my toes, literally, touch the end of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. Love the wide toe box and overall appearance
customer_reviews.author: Nstinehart

customer_reviews.title: Great for crossfit
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. I don't really use the pump much but they work well for crossfit!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Can't put it on!
customer_reviews.text: It has no shoe tongue, it's just a hole you have to fit your foot through....I can barely squeeze my foot in to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Killian

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Crossfit shoes ever! I don't spend anytime readjusting my laces!
customer_reviews.author: Beckalecka

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: When I work hard at the gym, the sneakers are deflated.
customer_reviews.author: Emizai Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: Bought for crossfir
customer_reviews.text: Barely used them once and I can already tell they will be my favorite shoes for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit when you manage to put it on, which requires quite an effort
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, perfect for workouts and coaching! Somewhat small foot opening since there is no tongue, but overall comfortable fit!
customer_reviews.author: ajbogacz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to get then on i hope that they will stretch out more
customer_reviews.author: Dayana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright color! These are the most comfortable shoes I own!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Levi

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have long skinny feet and shoes tend to slip off my heel. The pump in this shoes prevents that and is perfect for weight training. They keep my feet snug but the toe box is wide enough that my toes can spread out while I am exercising. These are light and strong and super comfortable. I love them so much that I bought an extra pair to wear around town so I could keep one for exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Amznmom

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoe - color
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe - color, quality; I had to return them; was not able to get my feet into them!!
customer_reviews.author: Dannele L. Pinson

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't the shoe for me. Pump didn't bring the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't the shoe for me. Pump didn't bring the arch high enough and the tongue of the shoe jabbed in to my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Yeva Zarova

customer_reviews.title: Nano pump
customer_reviews.text: Fine in general, although they where a bit smaller than I spected.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Alba

customer_reviews.title: Very strange shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular size but could not get these on my feet. They were made weirdly. No tongue. The laces were just on top of the shoe with no side opening.I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita E. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs super small! Sock fit style of shoe requires at least a half size up from your regular.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these. Like some reviewers said it is a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Like some reviewers said it is a little tight and hard to get your foot in the first time or two you wear them, but after that it's fine. I had Nike's Flyknits that I wore for running and classes at my gym. I hated them. These are more comfortable and amazing when I go HIIT at my OrangeTheory classes.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like these for weightlifting and light cardio. They are flat with nice room in the toe. I have narrow feet with high arches. They take a little bit of work to slide them on but once they're on, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect shoes for sports activities, how crossfit, running and walking
customer_reviews.author: carcalderon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect!!! they fit just right and are amazingly comfortable for crossfit! you got an A+ from me
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

product_meta.title: Reebok Crossfit Nano Pump Fusion Training Shoe
product_meta.description: CMEVA for better cushion and an anatomical heel and footbed for a secure fit. Lace-up front for a snug fit. Textile lining and a cushioned footbed for added comfort. Pump air cage gives you a heel air pumped collar to ensure you're locked in and supported. Rubber outsole. Imported.
